description.excerpt: In our recent [paper], we propose WaveGlow: a flow-based network capable of
maximizing the likelihood of the training data, which makes the training
Our [PyTorch] implementation produces audio samples at a rate of 1200
with fused residual and skip connections.
A Flow-based Generative Network for Speech Synthesis

installation.excerpt:
1. Clone our repo and initialize submodule

   ```command
   git clone https://github.com/NVIDIA/waveglow.git
   cd waveglow
   git submodule init
   git submodule update
   ```

2. Install requirements `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`

3. Install [Apex]

invocation.excerpt: N.b. use convert_model.py to convert your older models to the current model
Download [LJ Speech Data]. In this example it's in data/
For mixed precision training set "fp16_run": true on config.json.
